game.name: CoH 2 - The Western Front Armies: Oberkommando West
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 창작마당, Steam Cloud, 통계, 레벨 에디터 포함, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: This individual army for COH2 allows you to access all existing COH2 maps in auto-match, and play against all other existing factions in multiplayer. It can also be obtained at a discount by acquiring The Western Front Armies multiplayer standalone, where it is bundled with the USF army.
game.shortDescriptionEn: This individual army for COH2 allows you to access all existing COH2 maps in auto-match, and play against all other existing factions in multiplayer. It can also be obtained at a discount by acquiring The Western Front Armies multiplayer standalone, where it is bundled with the USF army.
game.developers: Relic Entertainment, Feral Interactive (Mac), Feral Interactive (Linux)
game.publishers: Relic Entertainment, Feral Interactive (Mac), Feral Interactive (Linux)
